summary: The sprint planning architect analyzed the backlog for easy-to-test stories aligned with BrightHR Lite MVP requirements and proposed two sprint options: one starting with mock login and basic employee directory search, and another focusing on directory CRUD basics, seeking client feedback to proceed.

actions.task: Review and select a sprint option or suggest tweaks

risks.risk: No real authentication implemented yet, potentially limiting secure app flow
risks.mitigation: Use mock login for initial testable prototype to build foundational features before adding real auth
